thread.title: Koch Political Network Takes A Deep Dive Into Community Organizing
thread.title_full: Koch Political Network Takes A Deep Dive Into Community Organizing

author: Peter Overby
title: Koch Political Network Takes A Deep Dive Into Community Organizing
text:
Koch Political Network Takes A Deep Dive Into Community Organizing October 12, 2015 5:10 AM ET Twitter 
Audio for this story from Morning Edition will be available at approximately 9:00 a.m. ET. 
The political network headed by David and Charles Koch is known for aggressive ads. But its grassroots work in communities across the country is seeking political change long after the campaign ends.
